column2: kable(table, caption = "Winter 2021 SEL Survey Respondents' Race", col.names = c("Race", "Percent (Total)"), subcaption = "blue is new") %>% kable_styling(full_width = T, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "responsive"), position = "left", fixed_thead = T) %>% row_spec(c(8), bold = T, color = "#049E64")
